  • Constructor Details

    • OfficerRegistrationService

      public OfficerRegistrationService()
      Constructs a new OfficerRegistrationService. Initializes the internal registration map.

  • Method Details

    • loadOfficerRegistrations

      public Map<String,OfficerRegistration> loadOfficerRegistrations(Map<String,User> users, List<Project> projects)
      Loads officer registration data from officer_registrations.csv. Validates registration IDs (uniqueness), dates, enum values, officer NRICs (must exist in `users` and be an HDBOfficer), and project names (must exist in `projects`). Populates the internal registration map.
      Specified by:
      loadOfficerRegistrations in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      users - A map of NRIC to User objects, used for validating officer NRICs.
      projects - A list of all Project objects, used for validating project names.
      Returns:
      A copy of the map containing all loaded and validated registrations (RegistrationID to OfficerRegistration object).

    • saveOfficerRegistrations

      public void saveOfficerRegistrations(Map<String,OfficerRegistration> registrationsToSave)
      Saves the provided map of officer registrations to officer_registrations.csv. Formats registration data for CSV storage. Overwrites the existing file. Updates the internal registration map to match the saved state.
      Specified by:
      saveOfficerRegistrations in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registrationsToSave - The map of registrations (RegistrationID to OfficerRegistration object) to save.

    • findRegistrationById

      public OfficerRegistration findRegistrationById(String registrationId)
      Finds an officer registration by its unique ID from the internally managed map.
      Specified by:
      findRegistrationById in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration to find.
      Returns:
      The OfficerRegistration object if found, or null otherwise.

    • getRegistrationsByOfficer

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getRegistrationsByOfficer(String officerNric)
      Retrieves a list of all registrations (regardless of status) made by a specific HDB Officer. Filters the internal registration map based on the officerNric field.
      Specified by:
      getRegistrationsByOfficer in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer.
      Returns:
      A list of OfficerRegistration objects for the specified officer. Returns an empty list if NRIC is null or no registrations are found.

    • getRegistrationsByProject

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getRegistrationsByProject(String projectName)
      Retrieves a list of all registrations (regardless of status) associated with a specific project. Filters the internal registration map based on the projectName field.
      Specified by:
      getRegistrationsByProject in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      projectName - The name of the project.
      Returns:
      A list of OfficerRegistration objects for the specified project. Returns an empty list if projectName is null or no registrations are found.

    • getRegistrationsByStatus

      public List<OfficerRegistration> getRegistrationsByStatus(OfficerRegistrationStatus status)
      Retrieves a list of all officer registrations that currently have a specific status. Filters the internal registration map based on the status field.
      Specified by:
      getRegistrationsByStatus in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      status - The OfficerRegistrationStatus to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of OfficerRegistration objects with the specified status. Returns an empty list if status is null or no registrations match.

    • getApprovedRegistrationForOfficer

      public OfficerRegistration getApprovedRegistrationForOfficer(String officerNric)
      Finds the specific registration record indicating which project an officer is currently approved to handle. Filters for APPROVED status and returns the first match found. Assumes an officer handles at most one project at a time.
      Specified by:
      getApprovedRegistrationForOfficer in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      officerNric - The NRIC of the officer.
      Returns:
      The OfficerRegistration object with APPROVED status for the officer, or null if none is found or NRIC is null.

    • addRegistration

      public void addRegistration(OfficerRegistration registration)
      Adds a new officer registration to the internal map if a registration with the same ID doesn't already exist. Prints an error message if a duplicate ID is detected.
      Specified by:
      addRegistration in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registration - The OfficerRegistration object to add.

    • removeRegistration

      public boolean removeRegistration(String registrationId)
      Removes an officer registration from the internal map based on its ID.
      Specified by:
      removeRegistration in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Parameters:
      registrationId - The ID of the registration to remove. If null, the method does nothing.
      Returns:
      true if the registration was found and removed, false otherwise.

    • getAllRegistrations

      public Map<String,OfficerRegistration> getAllRegistrations()
      Retrieves a copy of the map containing all officer registrations currently managed by the service. Returning a copy prevents external modification of the internal state.
      Specified by:
      getAllRegistrations in interface IOfficerRegistrationService
      Returns:
      A new HashMap containing all registrations (RegistrationID to OfficerRegistration object).
